scripts.ionic:serve:before: bin/update_project; sed -i -e "s!^\(import { Network } from 'vis-network/peer';.*\)!//\1!" -e "s!^//\(import { Network } from 'vis-network/dist/vis-network.js';.*\)!\1!" -e "s!^\(import { DataSet } from 'vis-data/peer';.*\)!//\1!" -e "s!^//\(import { DataSet } from 'vis-data/dist/esm.js';.*\)!\1!" src/components/dmj-zwave-config/dmj-zwave-config.ts;
scripts.ionic:build:before: bin/update_project; sed -i -e "s!^\(import { Network } from 'vis-network/peer';.*\)!//\1!" -e "s!^//\(import { Network } from 'vis-network/dist/vis-network.js';.*\)!\1!" -e "s!^\(import { DataSet } from 'vis-data/peer';.*\)!//\1!" -e "s!^//\(import { DataSet } from 'vis-data/dist/esm.js';.*\)!\1!" src/components/dmj-zwave-config/dmj-zwave-config.ts;
scripts.ionic:build:after: sed -i -e "s!^//\(import { Network } from 'vis-network/peer';.*\)!\1!" -e "s!^\(import { Network } from 'vis-network/dist/vis-network.js';.*\)!//\1!" -e "s!^//\(import { DataSet } from 'vis-data/peer';.*\)!\1!" -e "s!^\(import { DataSet } from 'vis-data/dist/esm.js';.*\)!//\1!" src/components/dmj-zwave-config/dmj-zwave-config.ts; sed -e 's!<title>Domoja.*</title>!<title>Domoja</title>!' < src/login.html > ~/domoja/www/login.html; sed -i -e 's!\.DomojaURL="[^"]*"!.DomojaURL=window.location.origin!' ~/domoja/www/build/main.js; cp src/manifest-auth.json ~/domoja/www; cd ~/domoja/www/assets/favicon && rm -f *.zip readme.txt;
